title: my friends account is hijacked

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
my friends account is hijacked
we cant sent a ticket cause he does not know the mail (in the picture you can see its different timezones)
is there anything we can do?

replies.body: if you go to the right account recovery option for the ticket, there will be an option there to let them know that you currently are unable to access the email currently listed on the account and you can provide an alternate email for riot to contact you at regarding the compromised account.

Have your friend submit a ticket to us with [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we will assist them as soon as we can!

Let me know if you have any questions.
